ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 153
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not technically a full set, since I m wearing a yellow ashen order sash instead of belt atm, should have orange one soon. Red one can wait, bottom of
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:05 02/02/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Clarity <roderick.duncan@...>
>Herrick: With a full set of cured you will do just fine at level 12 or even
>level 20. Some cheap stuff you could buy now or save up for:

Not technically a full set, since I'm wearing a yellow ashen order sash
instead of belt atm, should have orange one soon. Red one can wait, bottom
of befallen looks decidedly unpleasant. (I already had one scare falling
down the pit on lev 1, and had to get a rogue to recover my corpse)

>Onyx earrings (2agi ones) 5pp from Blackburrow
>Spiked collar (3ac 3str) 5pp from Blackburrow

k should be able to save that pretty quick selling lightstones from wisps

>then start saving up:
>Bracer of Erolisi (ac5 5str) 30pp from OOT

They sell stuff in OOT, where? On that island in the middle? Can u wear 2
of these then?

>Jagged bands (ac5 3str) 30-50pp from Unrest

Not sure where Unrest is..

Cheers,

Herrick
